snippet: Japan beat France, 2-1, to clinch its first Olympic medal and set up a rematch of last year’s women’s World Cup final with the United States.
abstract: Japanese women's soccer team defeats France, 2-1, ensuring it will win either a gold or silver medal when it plays the United States in the final.
lead_paragraph: Japan beat France, 2-1, to clinch its first Olympic medal and set up a rematch of last year’s women’s World Cup final with the United States.

headline.seo: Japan Beats France to Clinch a Medal and a Rematch
headline.main: With Medal, Japan Clinches Rematch, Too
headline.print_headline: With Medal, Japan Clinches Rematch, Too
